contentfulSermon.title: Jesus Vs. Religion: Week 1 - Heart Change vs Legalism

fields.notesFormatted:
Galatians 5:1-4

Legalism - Depending on rules and rituals to please God or gain something from Him

Heart Change - The work of God giving spiritual life

Acts 15:10-11

Matthew 11:29-30

Colossians 2:20-23

  1. Legalism leads to pretending, heavy burdens, self-righteousness, hell, superstition, missing the big picture, looking good on the outside but dead inside.

    Philippians 3:8-9

  2. Heart Change only God can do, leads outward change, and brings peace & joy.

  3. How Can Your Heart be Changed?

    Colossians 2:13-14

    John 3:16-17
